history.proof: intros v. qsimpl time: 1 use: notInFreeVarSys. srun best use: closedPA1 unfold: ClosedSystem.

exceptions.exn: In environment v : nat Unable to unify "exists f : fol.Formula ?M1456, List.In ?M1457 (freeVarFormula ?M1456 f) /\\ mem (fol.Formula ?M1456) (Empty_set (fol.Formula ?M1456)) f" with "exists f : fol.Formula LNT, List.In v (freeVarFormula LNT f) /\\ mem (fol.Formula LNT) PA f".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall v : nat, ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v PA

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
In_freeVarSys : forall L : Language, nat -> fol.System L -> Prop
closedNatToTerm : forall a v : nat, ~ List.In v (freeVarTerm LNT (natToTerm a))
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ List.In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
forallI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)
existSys : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ List.In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf (Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) g -> SysPrf (Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (existH v f)) g
PAdec : forall x : Formula, In Formula PA x \/ ~ In Formula PA x
folReplace.reduceCloseList : forall (L : Language) (l : list nat) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), (forall v : nat, List.In v l -> ~ In_freeVarSys L v T) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (closeList L l f1) (closeList L l f2))
folLogic.forallI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f)
folLogic.existSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ List.In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L (Add (fol.Formula L) T f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.existH L v f)) g
folLogic.existE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ List.In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
folReplace.reduceForall : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.forallH L v f1) (fol.forallH L v f2))
folReplace.impForall : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (fol.forallH L v f1) (fol.forallH L v f2))
folReplace.iffExist : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (fol.existH L v f1) (fol.existH L v f2))
folReplace.reduceExist : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.existH L v f1) (fol.existH L v f2))
reduceSubAll : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (map : nat -> fol.Term L) (A B : fol.Formula L), (forall v : nat, ~ In_freeVarSys L v T) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L A B) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (subAllFormula L A map) (subAllFormula L B map))
folReplace.reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))
subFormulaForall2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ List.In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ List.In nv (ListExt.list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (fol.forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then fol.forallH L x f else fol.forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s))
closedPA1 = fun (v : nat) (f : fol.Formula LNT) (H : mem (fol.Formula LNT) (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula InductionSchema PA1) PA2) PA3) PA4) PA5) PA6) f) => Union_ind Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula InductionSchema PA1) PA2) PA3) PA4) PA5) (Singleton Formula PA6) (fun f0 : Formula => ~ List.In v (freeVarFormula LNT f0)) (fun (x : Formula) (H0 : In Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula InductionSchema PA1) PA2) PA3) PA4) PA5) x) => Union_ind Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula (Add Formula InductionSchema PA1) PA2) PA3) PA4) (Singleton Formula PA5) (fun x0 : Formula => ~ List.In...
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t)
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
folProof.FA2 : forall (L : Language) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ List.In v (freeVarFormula L A) -> folProof.Prf L nil (fol.impH L A (fol.forallH L v A))
PA7 = fun (f : Formula) (v : nat) => close LNT (impH (substituteFormula LNT f v Zero) (impH (forallH v (impH f (substituteFormula LNT f v (Succ (var v))))) (forallH v f))) : Formula -> nat -> Formula Arguments PA7 _ _%nat_scope
freeVarClosed : forall (L : Language) (x : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ List.In v (freeVarFormula L (close L x))
folProof.GEN : forall (L : Language) (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (A : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ List.In v (freeVarListFormula L Axm) -> folProof.Prf L Axm A -> folProof.Prf L Axm (fol.forallH L v A)
notInFreeVarSys : forall (L : Language) (x : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L x (Empty_set (fol.Formula L))
folProof.FA3 : forall (L : Language) (A B : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), folProof.Prf L nil (fol.impH L (fol.forallH L v (fol.impH L A B)) (fol.impH L (fol.forallH L v A) (fol.forallH L v B)))
